column1: organisation_name
column3: There is active identification, monitoring and review of cyber security risks.
column4: The Board has a full and accurate picture that the organisations key information is being properly managed and is safe from cyber threats.
column5: You are confident the entire workforce understands and follows your organisations information governance policies & processes.
column6: You receive assurance on a regular basis that your suppliers and digital assets are secure, including penetration testing.
column7: There are robust due diligence mechanisms in place to ensure all 3rd parties comply with the law and central guidance and provide sufficient guarantees that personal data is handled safely and protected from unauthorised access, accidental loss, damage and destruction.
column8: All information governance requirements are articulated in third party contracts and monitored on an ongoing basis.
